00158    /*

00165    * Associate this Tether with an Atom.

00171    * Nullify pointer to Atom.

00187 
00188    /*
00189    * Nullify pointer to Partner.
00190    */ 
00191    inline void Tether::unsetPartner()
00192    {  if (partnerPtr_ != 0) partnerPtr_ = 0; }

00195    * Get anchor position by reference.
00196    */

00198    {  return anchor_; }
00199 
00200    /*
00201    * Get associated Atom by reference.
00202    */
00203    inline Atom& Tether::atom() const
00204    {  return *atomPtr_; }

00212    /*

00215    inline Tether& Tether::partner() const

00217 
00218    /*
00219    * Return true if this Tether is associated with an Atom.
00220    */
00221    inline bool Tether::hasAtom() const
00222    {  return (atomPtr_ != 0); }
00223 
00224    /*
00225    * Return true if this Tether has a partner.

00227    inline bool Tether::hasPartner() const
